dc:title: Some Random Thoughts on Poverty
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Embraces spiritual poverty and describes the growing popularity of it. Discusses the injustice of usury and the difficulties of the destitute. The remedy to poverty is "the acceptance of voluntary poverty."
